t: How To Perform An Advanced Amazon Search
s: Use advanced search options: Amazon offers advanced search options that allow you to refine your search by category, price range, customer reviews, and more. This can help you find exactly what you are looking for. Utilize filters: After entering your search keywords, you can further refine your search by using the filters on the left-hand side of the search results page.
